page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most people living in our grid work in either Bideford or Barnstaple. Both these towns are within easy commuting distance which is indeed why some people choose to live here. There is a Royal Marine Camp at Instow which employs a number of civilians. Very few people come into the grid to work. The teachers and kitchen staff do as do a few farm workers otherwise our grid offers no other employment. In the tourist season Instow is a busy little sailing and beach resort and local people are employed in seasonal work. It must all have been very different when the farms employed large numbers of people before they were replaced with machinery. Local craftsmen like the blacksmith would also have been found working in our area.
